text-settable: Please reserve a table in advance at Chillax Restaurant. Suggested reservations:
table-tip-1: > For 1 person: reserve a single square table (90cm x 90cm)
table-tip-2: > For 2 people: reserve a square table
table-tip-3: > For a group of 4‚Äì6 people: reserve a square or round table
table-tip-4: > For a group of 6‚Äì12 people: reserve a long table
table-tip-5: > For groups of more than 12 people: call the Hotline directly at 0379.700.700
title-pl: SPACE AND AREA OF CHILLAX RESTAURANT
content-pl-1: AIRY DINING SPACE ‚Äì IMMERSED IN NATURE
about-content-1: Nestled in a lush countryside landscape, Chillax restaurant is surrounded by rice fields and peaceful nature. Its rustic design, made with recycled wood, creates a cozy and relaxing atmosphere.
about-content-2: Address: 290 Cua Dai, turn into Nguyen Trai Street for 300m, Cam Chau Ward, Hoi An City üìç Just 3km from the Ancient Town and An Bang Beach ‚Äì 2.5km to Cua Dai Beach ‚Äì 4km to the Coconut Forest ‚Äì 6km to Thanh Ha Pottery Village.
about-content-8: Capacity for 500 guests, with both indoor and outdoor areas. Serving coffee, breakfast, and full meals ‚Äî perfect for parties, events, and group tours. Chillax also integrates organic farming, offering a culinary experience deeply connected to local culture and tourism.
textspace-content-1: Designed with both indoor and outdoor seating near breezy rice fields, allowing guests to enjoy delicious dishes while immersed in a poetic rural landscape.
textspace-content-2: Inside Chillax is built in a traditional, natural style that creates a harmonious space between heritage architecture and the raw beauty of its surroundings.

text-settable1: Chillax Eatery & Hangout always values your feedback ‚Äì it's the inspiration that helps us improve and grow every day.
experience.title: CHILLAX EXPERIENCE ACTIVITIES
experience.cooking.title: COOKING IN THE TRADITIONAL KITCHEN
experience.cooking.desc: One of the most popular activities at Chillax is the experience of cooking in a private traditional kitchen. Here, guests not only enjoy local cuisine but also prepare and cook dishes rich in regional identity themselves.
experience.farming.title: TRADITIONAL RICE PLANTING
experience.farming.desc: At Chillax, guests have the opportunity to directly participate in traditional rice planting activities with local people. This activity not only brings joy and relaxation but also helps visitors appreciate the value of rice and hard work.
experience.lantern.title: LANTERN MAKING CLASS
experience.lantern.desc: As the sun sets, the lanterns you make by hand will be lit up, sparkling warmly in the cozy Chillax space‚Äîa truly unforgettable experience.
experience.tea.title: AFTERNOON TEA EXPERIENCE
experience.tea.desc: Enjoy herbal teas and local traditional cakes & jams in the peaceful space of a traditional wooden house in Quang Nam.
experience.coffee.title: COFFEE BREWING
experience.coffee.desc: Learn about Vietnamese coffee culture, personally brew traditional coffee, and enjoy your self-made cup in a traditional wooden house of Quang Nam.
